title: SpeechSense (Research Tool)
description: Detects early vocal fatigue using neural embeddings. Implements ML-based fatigue prediction. Generates clinical voice health reports.

title: faker-pk (Python Library)
description: Python library for generating fake Pakistani personal & company data. Supports names, CNIC, phone numbers, addresses. Useful for prototyping, testing, and demos.

title: Voice Verification System
description: Real-time voice authentication using ECAPA embeddings and logistic regression. Fully on-device. Ensures secure identity verification.

title: DataForge
description: Multi-agent system automating data quality checks, cleaning, visualization, and queries. Generates PDF reports with explainable AI. Speeds up data analysis workflow

title: Multimodal AI System
description: Combines computer vision and NLP for emotion and behavioral confidence detection. Processes video and text inputs. Provides multimodal insights.

title: Vigilant Eye
description: Real-time violence detection using CNNs and OpenCV. Monitors live video feeds. Triggers alerts on violent activity.

title: Airflow Data Pipelines
description: Automated ETL pipelines for ML data preparation. Ensures consistent data ingestion and transformation. Supports scalable workflow management.

title: n8n AI Agents (Workflow Automation)
description: Automates repetitive tasks using n8n, LangChain, and APIs. Orchestrates multi-step workflows. Reduces manual intervention.

title: Predictive & Forecasting Models
description: Time-series forecasting and classification models. Includes anomaly detection. Supports actionable data insights.

title: Student Dropout Risk & Clustering Web App
description: ML-based clustering to identify at-risk students. Provides dropout risk analysis. Web interface for visualization.

title: ECAPA Acoustic Domain Classifier
description: Lightweight audio classifier using ECAPA-TDNN embeddings. Distinguishes speech, music, and noise. Supports real-time edge deployment.

title: AesthetiQ AI
description: Intelligent photo evaluation and tone-matching tool. Provides enhancement suggestions for photographers and editors. Offers automated aesthetic scoring.

title: AskMyDoc
description: Document Q/A bot for .txt, .pdf, and .docx files. Uses NLP to answer context-specific questions. Suitable for students and professionals.

title: Used Car Price Predictor App
description: ML app predicting used car prices using Random Forest. Inputs include brand, year, mileage, fuel type, transmission. Achieves 93.8% prediction accuracy.

title: Customer Churn Prediction Web App
description: Predicts customer churn using ML models. Includes interactive visualizations and SHAP explainability. Helps businesses optimize retention strategies.

title: Real Estate Price Prediction Web App
description: Forecasts real estate prices with ML models and Streamlit. Interactive dashboards with SHAP-based explainability. Supports live SQL queries for analytics.
